alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Florence (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 9:29PM EST until December 21 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina... Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. Black Creek At Quinby affecting Florence and Darlington Counties. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Pembroke, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Black Creek...including Quinby, Black Creek Nr Hartsville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Creek at Quinby. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Floodwaters spill over into yards of all residences on Creekside Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 11.9 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Monday afternoon.
